comments.en:
48 MB RAM, upgradeable to 112 MB
Emulations:
Prescribe II, HP Color LJ 5M (PCL 5C, PJL), PostScript II (KPDL2) with Automatic Emulation Sensing
1200 dpi in Postscript mode
600 dpi in HP mode
All common Barcode-Fonts (including 2D Barcodes) in ROM
Reprogrammable EEPROM
A network-interface like SB-110 (100 Mb/s, supported protocols: TCP/IP, AppleTalk, Novell) is highly recommended, the parallel-port is too slow for such amounts of data (printing a full-color 1200x1200 dpi DIN A4 page transfers up to 52 MB of data).
